    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities["Physical Device"].append("WIDAR Correlator hardware")

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+patient|the\s+sun|the\s+old"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities["Environment Object"].append("patient")

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"VLA\s+Expansion\s+Project\s+monitor\s+and\s+control\s+system|database|hard\s+disk"
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r""
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append("")

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []

    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) hardware", sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r"the ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)", sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system", sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r"shall ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)", sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) and", sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|application|program|system|app)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(hardware|device|machine|computer|equipment|instrument|sensor|actuator)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old|environment|object|entity|thing|item|product|service)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|card|disk|tape|file|folder|directory|repository|archive|library|catalog|registry|log|journal|ledger|book|record|document|file|folder|directory|repository|archive|library|catalog|registry|log|journal|ledger|book|record|document)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

        entities["Software System"].append("Correlator Monitor and Control System")

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:hardware|bandwidth|security|restrictions)"
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"].extend(physical_devices)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:user|location)"
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"].extend(environment_objects)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:database)"
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"].extend(external_systems)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:fully\s+observable\s+system|access\s+all\s+information\s+that\s+is\s+available\s+to\s+the\s+user)"
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"].extend(system_requirements)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:communication)"
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"].extend(shared_phenomena)

    return entities

import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = sentence.split()
    
    # Define the keywords for each entity type
    keywords = {
        "Software System": ["system", "software", "computer", "correlator"],
        "Physical Device": ["device", "hardware", "computer", "correlator"],
        "Environment Object": ["models", "time", "fiber-link", "phase", "corrections"],
        "External System": ["models", "time", "fiber-link", "phase", "corrections"],
        "System Requirements": ["data", "control", "package", "deliver"],
        "Shared Phenomena": ["data", "feeds", "control", "data"]
    }
    
    # Iterate over each token
    for token in tokens:
        # Iterate over each entity type
        for entity_type, keyword_list in keywords.items():
            # Check if the token matches any keyword
            if any(keyword in token for keyword in keyword_list):
                # Add the token to the corresponding entity list
                entities[entity_type].append(token)
    
    # Return the entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(device|devices)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(location|locations)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(database|card|disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"need\s+to\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(event|events|state|states|value|values)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"aim|purpose|develop"

    entities["Environment Object"] = [match[0] for match in environment_object_matches]
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (Network|System|Interface|Database)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [match[0] for match in external_system_matches]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (Specifications|Requirements)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = []
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }
    
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        for match in matches:
            entities.append({"name": match, "type": entity_type})
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [device for device in physical_devices if device in entities["Software System"]]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities["Software System"] and object not in entities["Physical Device"]]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities["Software System"] and system not in entities["Physical Device"] and system not in entities["Environment Object"]]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities["Software System"] and requirement not in entities["Physical Device"] and requirement not in entities["Environment Object"] and requirement not in entities["External System"]]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities["Software System"] and phenomenon not in entities["Physical Device"] and phenomenon not in entities["Environment Object"] and phenomenon not in entities["External System"] and phenomenon not in entities["System Requirements"]]
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["Software System"].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sprocessors|([A-Za-z\s]+)\sinputs"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"all\sdata\sprocessing\sdeadlines\sand\santicipated\sfuture\srequirements|sufficient\sperformance\sto\savoid\sdata\sloss,\s(corruption|overflows)"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(match.group(0))

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|app|application)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(printer|user|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card|sun|old|patient)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(send|receive|stamp|generate)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is off line|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is under the control of"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [match[0] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) Expansion Project Monitor and Control System"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"provide full system access for ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is off line|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is under the control of"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

    if external_system:
        entities["External System"].append(re.search(r"(\w+\s*\w*)", sentence, re.IGNORECASE).group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.search(r"shall be able to (send|receive)\s*(data|information) to (the)?\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(which is the aim and purpose of the system to be developed)", sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

    if shared_phenomena:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(re.search(r"(\w+\s*\w*)", sentence, re.IGNORECASE).group(1).strip())

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities["Software System"]]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities["Software System"] and object not in entities["Physical Device"]]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities["Software System"] and system not in entities["Physical Device"] and system not in entities["Environment Object"]]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities["Software System"] and requirement not in entities["Physical Device"] and requirement not in entities["Environment Object"] and requirement not in entities["External System"]]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities["Software System"] and phenomenon not in entities["Physical Device"] and phenomenon not in entities["Environment Object"] and phenomenon not in entities["External System"] and phenomenon not in entities["System Requirements"]]
    
    return entities

# Test the function

import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = []
    # Software System
    if 'system' in sentence.lower():
        entities.append('Software System')
    # Physical Device
    if 'device' in sentence.lower():
        entities.append('Physical Device')
    # Environment Object
    if 'patient' in sentence.lower() or 'sun' in sentence.lower() or 'old' in sentence.lower():
        entities.append('Environment Object')
    # External System
    if 'database' in sentence.lower() or 'magnetic stripe card' in sentence.lower() or 'tap' in sentence.lower() or 'hard disk' in sentence.lower():
        entities.append('External System')
    # System Requirements
    if 'aim' in sentence.lower() or 'purpose' in sentence.lower():
        entities.append('System Requirements')
    # Shared Phenomena
    if 'events' in sentence.lower() or 'states' in sentence.lower() or 'values' in sentence.lower():
        entities.append('Shared Phenomena')
    return json.dumps(entities)
